skill.name: Harpies' Hunting Ground
skill.description: Can only be used at the beginning of the Main Phase of your first turn. Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck and place 1 "Harpies' Hunting Ground" to your Field Zone, from your Deck. If you control a Field Spell, place it in the Graveyard.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Mai Valentine appears at the gate at stage 10 (DM)
Mai Valentine level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
is used in Amazoness, Stall and Burn decks!

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Ishizu Ishtar efficiently! Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Ishizu Ishtar

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.

skill.name: Bring it!
skill.description: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. Return 1 card from you hand to your Deck; then, add 1 Level 8 DARK Warrior-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Aster Phoenix efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Aster Phoenix

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Aster Phoenix level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Summon DARK Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Successfully perfom 2 Fusion Summon(s) in one Duel.
Achieve 3 win(s) without using any level 5 or higher Monster Cards.
Win 1 Duel(s) against Aster Phoenix at Level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yami Yugi efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yami Yugi

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Mind of the Plana
skill.description: Send all of your opponent's banished cards to another dimension. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Aigami. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Aigami

children.content: Gate Keys to Duel at the Gate
Aigami appears at the gate at Stage 10 (DSOD)
Achieve 1 Comeback Victory(ies) in Duels against Aigami at level 30 using
Inflict 7000 or more points of effect damage in Duels against Aigami.
Use Level 7 or higher Moinster Cards 1 time(s) in one Duel against Aigami at level 30 using
Use Continuous Trap Cards 3 time(s) in Duels against Aigami at level 30 using

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yami Yugi efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yami Yugi

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.
